FuncDef: The local-bill cache backup command transfers bills in the local bill pool to the CF card or bill server.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After you configure the transfer mode for bills in the local bill pool, bills are automatically transferred to the CF card or bill server when the transfer condition is met.
However, if you need bill transfer before the transfer trigger condition is met, run the local-bill cache backup command to manually perform bill transfer.
Prerequisites
A local bill transfer mode has been specified using the local-bill cache backup-mode command, with the mode not being none. The target bill server has been configured properly.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
